>>>DOCUMENT

######################################################################

title:: Listing Environment

id:: td-000006

######################################################################

This SML document contains a listing environment.  An environment is a
division that describes the intended structure of the text.  The
following environment is a table.

---LISTING

title:: My Listing

id:: my-listing

description:: This is a description of my listing.  The purpose of this
listing is to serve as a test for applications designed to process SML
listing environments.

listing line 1
listing line 2
listing line 3
listing line 4


  ...BIG BLANK SPACE...


listing line 5
listing line 6
listing line 7
listing line 8
listing line 9
listing line 10

---LISTING

<<<DOCUMENT
